Bash(curl -sL "https://docs.chainlit.io/data-persistence/history" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "
import sys, re
html = sys.stdin.read\(\)
# Remove HTML tags but keep text
text = re.sub\(r'<script[^>]*>.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<style[^>]*>.*?</style>', '', text, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<[^>]+>', ' ', text\)
text = re.sub\(r'\\s+', ' ', text\)
print\(text[:8000]\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(for page in "open-source-data-layers" "open-source-data-layers/custom" "open-source-data-layers/overview"; do
  echo "=== $page ==="
  curl -sL "https://docs.chainlit.io/data-persistence/$page" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "
import sys, re
html = sys.stdin.read\(\)
text = re.sub\(r'<script[^>]*>.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<style[^>]*>.*?</style>', '', text, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<[^>]+>', ' ', text\)
text = re.sub\(r'\\s+', ' ', text\)
print\(text[:5000]\)
"
  echo ""
done 2>&1)

Bash(cd "D:/Workspace/AgenticAnalytics" && source .venv/Scripts/activate && python -c "
# Find StepDict and how to register data layer
from chainlit.step import StepDict
import inspect
print\('=== StepDict ==='\)
print\(inspect.getsource\(StepDict\)[:1500]\)
print\(\)

# Find PageInfo
from chainlit.types import PageInfo
print\('=== PageInfo ==='\)
print\(inspect.getsource\(PageInfo\)\)
print\(\)

# How to register data layer - check chainlit.data __init__
import chainlit.data as cd
src = inspect.getsource\(cd\)
for line in src.split\('\\n'\):
    l = line.strip\(\)
    if l and \('data_layer' in l.lower\(\) or 'datalayer' in l.lower\(\) or 'def ' in l or 'class ' in l\):
        print\(line\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /d/Workspace/AgenticAnalytics/main && source ../.venv/Scripts/activate && python -c "
import sys

print\('=== 1. Core imports ==='\)
from config import \(
    GROUP_BY_COLUMNS, MIN_BUCKET_SIZE, MAX_BUCKET_SIZE, TAIL_BUCKET_ENABLED,
    LLM_ANALYSIS_COLUMNS, PPTX_TEMPLATE_PATH, DEFAULT_CSV_PATH,
    FRICTION_AGENTS, REPORTING_AGENTS, ALL_DOMAIN_SKILLS,
    DATA_DIR, LOG_LEVEL, VERBOSE, MAX_DISPLAY_LENGTH, TOP_N_DEFAULT,
\)
print\('  config OK'\)

print\('=== 2. Core modules ==='\)
from core.data_store import DataStore
from core.skill_loader import SkillLoader
from core.agent_factory import AgentFactory
from core.agent_loader import load_agent
from core.llm import get_llm
print\('  core imports OK'\)

print\('=== 3. State & Schemas ==='\)
from agents.state import AnalyticsState, ExecutionTrace
from agents.schemas import \(
    SupervisorOutput, PlannerOutput, DataAnalystOutput,
    SynthesizerOutput, CritiqueOutput, STRUCTURED_OUTPUT_SCHEMAS,
\)
print\(f'  Structured schemas: {list\(STRUCTURED_OUTPUT_SCHEMAS.keys\(\)\)}'\)
print\('  state + schemas OK'\)

print\('=== 4. Tools ==='\)
from tools import \(
    TOOL_REGISTRY, ANALYSIS_TOOLS, CRITIQUE_TOOLS, SUPERVISOR_TOOLS,
    CHART_TOOLS, DATA_TOOLS, REPORT_TOOLS,
    set_analysis_deps, reset_findings, add_finding,
\)
print\(f'  TOOL_REGISTRY: {len\(TOOL_REGISTRY\)} tools'\)
print\(f'  REPORT_TOOLS: {[t.name for t in REPORT_TOOLS]}'\)
print\('  tools OK'\)

print\('=== 5. PPTX export ==='\)
from utils.pptx_export import generate_pptx_from_slides, markdown_to_pptx
print\('  pptx_export OK'\)

print\('=== 6. UI components ==='\)
from ui.components import send_downloads
print\('  ui OK'\)

print\('=== 7. Nodes ==='\)
from agents.nodes import make_agent_node, user_checkpoint_node
print\('  nodes OK'\)

print\('=== 8. Agent definitions ==='\)
import os
agents_dir = 'agents/definitions'
for f in sorted\(os.listdir\(agents_dir\)\):
    if f.endswith\('.md'\):
        agent = load_agent\(os.path.join\(agents_dir, f\)\)
        tools_list = agent.get\('tools', []\)
        print\(f'  {f}: tools={tools_list}'\)
print\('  agent definitions OK'\)

print\('=== 9. Domain skills ==='\)
skills_dir = 'skills/domain'
for f in sorted\(os.listdir\(skills_dir\)\):
    if f.endswith\('.md'\):
        print\(f'  {f}: exists'\)
print\('  skills OK'\)

print\(\)
print\('=== ALL IMPORTS PASSED ==='\)
" 2>&1)
